alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Gusty thunderstorm winds will impact portions of central Darlington County through 945 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, or 11 miles northwest of Hartsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Dangerous lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hartsville, North Hartsville, Clyde, Dovesville, Oats, Lydia, Auburn, Floyd, Swift Creek, Kellytown, Society Hill and Carolina Pines Regional Medical Center. This includes Interstate 20 near mile marker 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
